        public void createRandom(int minSize,

                int testCt,
                java.lang.String algorithm)
                  throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Create a randomized KAT.
        Parameters:
        minSize -
        maxSize -
        testCt - number of tests to generate
        algorithm - algorithm to run on the input to get the output... right now this only works for message digest
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm argument is not known

      • simpleStrings

        public java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> simpleStrings()
        Returns:
        Entry of two strings. Each line has a size followed by a hex string representing either an input or an output. The key is the input and the value is the output
